answers.answer: Hi there,I may be able to confirm whether she can conceive or not only after a complete clinical examination and work up. As a woman ages a woman’s egg supply and quality decreases and eggs which remain are likely to have chromosomal problems .This increases the risk for miscarriage and birth defects. The chances of pregnancy complications like high blood pressure and diabetes are high. There are increased chances of delivering a low-birth-weight or preterm baby. But this may not happen with all pregnancies. If your girlfriend wants to get pregnant she should see a gynecologist for examination and queries. Do keep me posted.Best luck and regards!
I will also mention.. she has very low blood pressure . im not sure if that helps or not .she is fillopino
My mom got pregnant at 40. But the doctor can give her medicine called clomid. which would make her ovulate more. or you have a better chance of conceiving.

There is no percentage as every woman is different.  I will be 40 in 3 months and am 29 weeks pregnant.  Got pregnant first try.  Based on what I've seen,  it gets harder for a woman to conceive around 42,  43ish.  Although I've seen a lot of natural conceptions on this website for those who are 45.  Your gf is in that age where it's still very possible but she needs to act fast.  That is,  if she wants to attemp conceiving using her own eggs.  She needs to see an RE ASAP.

question: Himy new girlfriend is 44 she has 3 kids , the youngest being 11 .. just wanted to know the chances of her falling pregnant.shes slim and fit  If that helps .. could you give me a % please  ..   Thanks
title: chances of falling pregnant at 44
